home.title: Tag Everyone - Telegram Bot to mention all group members
home.description: Mention all members of your Telegram group with a single command. Simple, fast and effective. Add the bot for free!
home.keywords: telegram, bot, mention, tag, everyone, group, tag everyone, telegram bot, telegram group

hero.subtitle: Mention all members of your Telegram group with a single command. Simple, fast, and effective.
hero.botMessage: I have mentioned all group members.

features.title: Powerful and Intuitive Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage group mentions efficiently and professionally.

unlimited_mention.title: Unlimited Mentions
unlimited_mention.description: Mention all group users with a single command, without limitations.

basic_commands.title: Simple Commands
basic_commands.description: Intuitive interface with easy-to-use commands for tagging users.

basic_webapp.title: Integrated Web App
basic_webapp.description: Complete web dashboard to easily manage all your groups.

custom_lists.title: Custom Lists
custom_lists.description: Create and manage custom user lists to mention them separately.

reduced_cooldown.title: Optimized Speed
reduced_cooldown.description: Reduced waiting time between mentions for greater efficiency.

no_activity_logs.title: Privacy Guaranteed
no_activity_logs.description: No activity logs to ensure maximum privacy for users.

ad_free_experience.title: Clean Experience
ad_free_experience.description: Ad-free interface for an optimal user experience.

dedicated_instance.title: High Performance
dedicated_instance.description: Dedicated resources to ensure top speed and stability.

community_support.title: Open Source
community_support.description: Fully open source project with active community support.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Add TagEveryone to your Telegram Group and start managing mentions professionally.

footer.description: The complete solution to easily manage your tags and mentions on Telegram.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: This Privacy Policy describes how TagEveryone collects, uses, and protects the personal information of users who use our Telegram bot.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: We use the collected data to:

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except as required by law or to provide essential bot services through Telegram's API.

security.title: Security
security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
items: Object to the processing of your data

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, contact us through the bot's official channels or via email.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using TagEveryone, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the bot.

serviceUse.title: Use of Service
serviceUse.description: You agree to use TagEveryone responsibly and in accordance with the following guidelines:
items: Do not use the bot for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Do not attempt to violate or compromise the bot's security
Respect usage limits and Telegram's rules
Do not use the bot to send spam or inappropriate content

prohibited.title: Prohibited Behaviors
items: Use the bot to harass, threaten, or defame other users
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the bot's systems
Distribute malware or harmful content through the bot

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: TagEveryone is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for any damages arising from the use of the bot, including but not limited to data loss or service interruptions.

modifications.title: Service Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time without notice. We also reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the bot for any user who violates these Terms of Service or Telegram's policies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions regarding these Terms of Service, contact us through the bot's official channels.

whatAre.title: What Are Cookies
whatAre.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They are used to improve your experience and analyze site usage.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.description: We use cookies to remember your preferences, such as the selected language, and to analyze website traffic in order to improve our services.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the site and cannot be disabled. Includes cookies for session management and preferences.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies store your preferences, such as the selected language and display settings.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how users interact with the site, allowing us to improve the user experience.

management.title: Cookie Management
management.description: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings:
items: Delete cookies when closing the browser
Receive a notification before new cookies are stored

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Some cookies may be set by third-party services that appear on our pages, such as analytics services or embedded content.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions regarding this Cookie Policy, contact us through official channels.
